verses.text: Calec wach' lolonel t'a Jehová. Aljokab' wach' lolonel t'a Jehová masanto t'a schaanhil satcha’anh.
Alec wach' lolonel t'ay masanil ex yángel. Alec wach' lolonel masanil ex soldadoal satcha’anh.
Ik'chajokab' chaanh Jehová yuj k'u yet' k'een uj. Ik'chajokab' chaanh yuj k'een nitk'anal te wach' yilji yoc.
Ik'chajokab' chaanh yuj satcha’anh, to chaanh ay yet' pax yuj ha ha' ayek' t'a yib'anh satcha’anh chi'.
Alchajokab' wach' lolonel t'a Jehová, yujto tonhej ix yala' ix b'okan smasanil.
A' ix b'oankan masanil juntzanh chi' t'a yet'tal yic wach' ayek' ta' t'a masanil tiempo, ix yak'ankanoch t'a sleyal to malaj b'ak'uinh ol k'exchajoc.
Yalokab' wach' lolonel t'a Jehová masanil tastac ay t'a sat lu'um tik, nok' niwac nok' ay t'a yol ha' mar yet' pax nok' ay t'a sjulal yich ha',
yet' lheb'lon, k'een sacb'at, k'een sacb'akom, k'ik'al asun yet' chacxuxum ik', k'anab'ajumokab' syutej sb'ha t'a slolonel Jehová chi'.
Yalokab' wach' lolonel lum niwac witz t'a Jehová, lum tzalquixtac, te te' syak' sat, te' k'ute',
yet' nok' k'ultaquil nok', nok' molb'etzal nok', nok' snherwi, ma sjachwi yet' pax nok' much.
Ex sreyal yol yib'anhk’inal tik, ex anima t'a junjun chonhab', ex yajal yet' ex tze b'o yaj heb' chonhab',
ex winak, ex ix, ex ichamtac anima yet' pax ex unin, alec wach' lolonel t'a Jehová he masanil.
Alec wach' lolonel t'a Jehová he masanil yujto anhej te b'inajnac. Ha stziquiquial ay masanto t'a yib'anh satcha’anh yet' t'a yib'anh lum lum tik.
A' ix ak'an quipal a onh schonhab' onh tik. Calec wach' lolonel t'ay a onh israel onh tik, a onhton te xajanab'il onh yuj. Calec wach' lolonel t'a Jehová.
